cause.description:
Special Olympics Wisconsin provides sports training and competition for nearly 10,000 athletes with cognitive disabilities in 18 different sports year-round. This cause is specfically to support that.
Please join us, and invite others to join!
This Facebook cause is here to give young people the opportunity to help. Donate, volunteer, inform others, etc. Just about anything will help. I know most students can't write out a big check for a contribution, but 1000 people committing to $2 or $5 or $10 apiece adds up.
http://www.specialolympicswisconsin.org/
Special Olympics is the official charity supported by Phi Sigma Kappa Fraternity nationally, and the initiative behind this Facebook Cause is to bring more support to the Wisconsin-based Special Olympic groups.
1. Special Olympics Wisconsin provides sports training and competition for nearly 10,000 athletes with cognitive disabilities in 18 different sports year-round.
cause.mission: Raise awareness, funds, and create a communications network for people on Facebook to volunteer.
cause.name: Support Special Olympics in Wisconsin!
